summary: The Contoso Wireless streaming product offers HDTV, On-Demand Video, and Music Streaming services. The HDTV service starts at $19.99/month and the On-Demand Video service starts at $7.99/month. The Music Streaming service is free with a Contoso Wireless subscription. The streaming product can be watched on up to 5 devices at the same time and can be canceled at any time with 30 days notice. Additionally, add-ons like DVR storage space and premium channel packages are available for an additional fee.
